Reviews.Title: “Cozy little place”
Reviews.Author: Eliza5858
Reviews.Content: concierge helpful friendly location excellent coconut grove arts festival hotel 10 minutes airport 15 minutes beach coral gables beautiful little city walking distance downtown commercial trolley available free front hotel downtown city ponce de leon main boulevard hotel overalla cozy little

Reviews.Title: “New Years Eve 2011”
Reviews.Author: ronald j
Reviews.Content: hotel actually coral gables close coconut grove downtown miami bayfront bayside park traveling experience easier celebrations hoped fora 2012 hope reservation king size bedroom double bedroom allowed bring maltese limited bottom floor double beds dont misunderstand hotel pet friendly told im paying king getting double happy

Reviews.Title: “Worse than any hostel I have stayed at”
Reviews.Author: KStreetQB
Reviews.Content: smelled armpit springs poking matress ac unit arrived 80 degrees unit powerful cool isnt close wall paper peeling walls maybe worst ive stayed im budget traveller

Reviews.Title: “ON FILTHY AZZ HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: SFC THOM ABN U
Reviews.Content: stayed 2007 hope rude people filthy hotel beer cold waiters waitress majority employees bad joint tell future customers dont gross believe army retired san pedro honduras

Reviews.Title: “For the price, a good place to stay that is near downtown”
Reviews.Author: zbmw008
Reviews.Content: friends traveled miami attend music festival stay night hotels located downtown miami 400 night hotel provided bargain services offered spacious clean balcony overlooking ponce de leon blvd furniture slightly outdated overall staff accommodating stay near miami

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Chateaubleau
HotelInfo.Address: 1111 Ponce de Leon Blvd, Miami, FL 33134-3321 (Formerly BEST WESTERN Chateaubleau Inn)
